Before you begin installation Offline Server 2.1, make sure that:
- You have installed a clean version, with no cracks,
- You have updated the game to version 1.01,
- You have updated launcher to the latest version
- You have administrator rights on this computer
- You have created Ubisoft Account.
If you have it all, you can install crack to the folder with the game.

8)go to start then run write service.msc and search for "world wide publishing service and disable it everything should be fine (if not)

9)try this go to command prompt and type "netstat -ano". You must see if there is a programm using port 80. Look for the number 0.0.0.0:80 or 127.0.0.1:80. If you find them look at the far right of the screen and write down the corresponding PID number.

For those of you having problems even getting the game to launch with the offline server software... 

1.) When you copy/paste the lines to your hosts file, DELETE EXTRA SPACES between the "127.0.0.1" and the URL address.. there should only be ONE space between the IP and the URL in each line. (AiTB, you might want to correct this in your description of the torrent.)

2.) A lot of folks are having issues with the offline server crack.. as did I. I fixed my issue by instead using:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5496065/Assassin_s_Creed_2_Crack_%28Final_and_complete%29

instead of using the "raw" offline server, use the "AC2 Simple Laucher coded by Approved". This will auto load the offline server, as well as give you a gui to launch the game.

Works like a charm. Hope that helps!
